name: feelzr
description: just like horoscopes only for real
overview:
Many people have long believed, as astrologers believe, that the day you were born affects your destiny and life path.

While no one knows exactly how or why, and while many people have devoted their lives to understand how it works… feelzr comes to change all this in a very simple, rational and entertaining way.

Video: http://vimeo.com/feelzr/prelaunch

How feelzr works:

Lets say you live in Paris, France, and you are connected to one thousand people on feelzr, born on the same day as you, and they live in Tokyo, Japan…

if your time now was 12:00pm…. then their time would be 7:00pm … they’re 7 hours ahead of you… in your relative future.

So throughout their day, in order for them to get their own reading… they’ve been sharing and tagging their feelings on the feelzr scale…

Whenever you need to see what’s coming in the next few hours all you need to do is share how you feel…. then you get your personal report of what’s coming in 2, 4 or 6 hours… as its been experienced already from the rest of the people born on the same day as you!

We’re currently in private beta! Ask for early access by filling out the form on www.feelzr.com
